gui.platformer.slot.storage.info: Storage; used to store materials needed for crafting.
gui.platformer.slot.craft.info: Craft Output; if materials needed are available click here to craft.
gui.platformer.slot.decon.info: Deconstruction; platforms can be broken down here. Stack size must be equal or greater to the amount received when crafting.
gui.platformer.slot.buffer.info: Output Buffer; used as temporary storage for automation. This must be empty before more can be crafted.
gui.platformer.slot.material.info: Material Choice; defines look and material used.
gui.platformer.button.select.info: Platform Selector; cycles between the available platform type.
gui.platformer.preview.info: Platform Preview; rendering of the final product.
